The post features a photo of Chinese For: with Korean text that translates to English as: “Immediately after Wang Yi returns [to China].... Moon Jae-in announces ‘We have procured vaccines for 45 million people’”.
The Korean: language post states that the vaccines are effective because they were made in China, where the coronavirus originated, and that they were promised after flattering Wang Yi during his visit.
Official statements from both South Kore: s presidential office and foreign ministry on Wang’s visit make no reference to discussions on the importation of China-made novel coronavirus vaccines, or agreements on its procurement.
